sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:pricing: $350 USD for preparation of 100 µL virus + $30 USD for plasmid.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:shipment: Viral particles are shipped frozen on dry ice. Plasmid DNA (≥ 200ng) will also be included in the shipment.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: vertebrate consensus sequence for strong initiation of translation (Kozak, 1987)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: vertebrate consensus sequence for strong initiation of translation (Kozak, 1987)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: CaMKII promoter
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: CaMKII promoter
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: promoter for the mouse calcium/calmodulin-dependent kinase II alpha subunit

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:storage: Store at -80℃. Thaw just before use and keep on ice.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: pBRforEco
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: pBRforEco
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: pBR322 vectors, upsteam of EcoRI site, forward primer

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: f1 ori
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: f1 ori
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: f1 bacteriophage origin of replication; arrow indicates direction of (+) strand synthesis

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:purpose: Expresses a soma-targeted GtACR2 in mammalian neurons under the CaMKIIa promoter
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pAAV-CKIIa-stGtACR2-FusionRed was a gift from Ofer Yizhar (Addgene plasmid # 105669 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:105669 ; RRID:Addgene_105669) For viral preps, please replace (Addgene plasmid # 105669) in the above sentence with: (Addgene viral prep # 105669-AAV1) or (Addgene viral prep # 105669-AAVrg)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: AAV2 ITR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: inverted terminal repeat of adeno-associated virus serotype 2
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: AAV2 ITR

sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Expresses a soma-targeted GtACR2 in mammalian neurons under the CaMKIIa promoter.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:tagsFusionProteins: FusionRed (C terminal on backbone) Kv2.1 (C terminal on backbone)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: AmpR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: confers resistance to ampicillin, carbenicillin, and related antibiotics
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: AmpR

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:growthInstructions: Use recA deficient growth strain to prevent homologous recombination.
